title: adidas Originals Women's Samba OG "Cow Print"
metadata:
{"description": "

The adidas Originals Women's Samba OG \"Cow Print\" is a statement piece that seamlessly blends classic design with a bold aesthetic. Born from the innovative vision of adidas, a brand known for driving performance and cultural expression, this sneaker offers a unique twist on the iconic Samba silhouette. The \"Cow Print\" edition adds a playful yet chic element to your collection, making it a must-have for those who appreciate both style and substance. Crafted from premium materials like suede, rubber, and leather, this sneaker not only promises durability but also ensures comfort with every wear. Its animal print design is perfect for those looking to make a fashion-forward statement.

  • Materials: Suede, Rubber and Leather
  • Colour: Animal Print
  • Gender: Women
  • Reference: KI6956
